tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blackmail_material (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  information_collected TEXT,
  coercion_method VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blackmail_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  target_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  record_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES blackmail_targets(target_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blackmail_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target_id INT NOT NULL,
    blackmailer_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);
